response.original_title: Adelante - A luta das venezuelanas refugiadas no Brasil
response.overview: Adelante is an invitation to immerse ourselves in the stories of eight refugee Venezuelan women. The documentary is an intimate description of the consequences of a political situation affecting an entire country.  By bus, hitch-hiking, on foot, these women have travelled 214 kilometers with the dream of leaving hunger, lack of medicines, homophobia, sexism and political confrontations behind.  Yuleima, Maritza, Juling, Ruth, Daynelis, Jennifer, Nairobis and Yalsy narrate, in their own words, what it is like to be an eâ€™chapalante woman. They continue to look for a better life, beginning their stories from scratch.
response.title: Adelante: The struggle of the Venezuelan refugees woman in Brazil
